# Structure prediction

Once sequences have been generated for the backbone design via inverse folding, we want to predict more accurately if this binder sequence is likely to fold into the correct structure.

This allows us to assess the quality of the proposed protein-protein interface.

- Alphafold scores: pLDDT, PAE, pae_interaction, TM, pTM, ipTM, oh my !
  - https://www.ebi.ac.uk/training/online/courses/alphafold/


af2_initial_guess vs. Alphafold2 (vs. ColabFold modes vs. other structure prediction tools)
